cause.description:
Please support Irena to find her other half.. Tall Dark smart and strong with a Prince's charm!!!
1. Irena is a person worth finding the love of her life
2. Irena has been through a lot in Paris lets make her a gift to remember and be thankfull for
cause.mission: To find that perfect match for Irena
cause.name: Find a Prince charming for Irena
